body: nit: use AT_CHECK. Also I think the error message should say something like `Backward for SVD when compute_uv=False is not implemented, ....` because the current message may mislead people into thinking that general backward for SVD is not supported.
body_html: nit: use AT_CHECK. Also I think the error message should say something like Backward for SVD when compute_uv=False is not implemented, .... because the current message may mislead people into thinking that general backward for SVD is not supported.
